text: Lars Erik Hindmar (born Karlsson; 11 December 1921 - 21 December 2018) was a Swedish racewalker. He competed at the 1952 Summer Olympics in the 10 km and at the 1956 Summer Olympics in the 20 km event, but was disqualified in both cases. He was born in Bor√•s, Sweden.Lars Hindmar.
